appShortcutName: User Interface for Elite Dangerous HUD Mod
appDisplayName: User Interface for Elite Dangerous HUD Mod
description:
The purpose of EDHM is to allow players of the game to customize their HUD Colors in many ways. This is estrictly a graphical mod, we dont change any in-game mechanics or things that FDev charges for.


- Little patch to ensure compatibility with incoming v3.0
